byListingWithoutShelf.map:
(doc)->
  if (not doc.shelves?) or doc.shelves.length is 0
    emit [doc.owner, doc.listing], null

publicByDate.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.listing is 'public'
    emit doc.created, null

publicByOwnerAndDate.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.listing is 'public'
    emit [doc.owner, doc.created], null

publicByShelfAndDate.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.shelves?
    for shelf in doc.shelves
      if doc.listing is 'public'  
          emit [shelf, doc.created], null

missingPicture.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.title?
    if doc.pictures.length is 0
      emit doc.created, null

byPreviousEntity.map:
(doc)->
    if doc.previousEntity?
      for uri in doc.previousEntity
        emit uri, null

byShelvesAndListing.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.shelves?
    for shelf in doc.shelves
      emit [shelf, doc.listing], null
